headline: Blackstone Makes Another Massive Big Tech Investment With $300 Million Buy In Of AI Data Company
summary: Private equity giant Blackstone has been making aggressive moves in the AI sector for several years and that trend will continue in 2025. According to the Wall Street Journal, Blackstone is making a $300 million investment in tech company DDN. This ...

headline: Banks Play Matchmakers in Private Credit Shift to High Grade
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Constraints on banks’ ability to take on risk is opening the door for private credit to go after their top-tier clients. headline: Baron Real Estate Fund Q4 2024 Shareholder Letter
summary: Baron Real Estate Fund declined in the fourth quarter of 2024, underperforming its benchmark, the MSCI USA IMI Extended Real Estate Index. Read more here.
